roleset.name: eliminate falsehoods

example.name: the only example?
example.text: Perhaps *trace*-1 to debunk the analysts' talk of over-capacity, Michael-1 today will take some of the skeptics on a tour of its new Gaylord, Minn., plant.
example.arg: debunk the analysts' talk of over-capacity,

roleset.note: DEBUNK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'debunk' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison. (from debunk.01-v predicate notes)
